caption.p: Bird-to-bird WNV transmission occurs only in non-vaccinated magpies. Percentage of animals infected by bird-to-bird contact (A), viremia titres (B), neutralizing antibody (NAb) titres, PRNT 90 (C), and viral titres in feather follicles (D) in contact-infected magpies. Solid and empty symbols represent contact birds housed with non-vaccinated and vaccinated animals, respectively.
